review.comment: I had a fantastic dental visit with Kelly the hygienist & Dr. Gilge. Kelly was both gentle & thorough with my cleaning & educated me on my oral hygiene and Dr. Gilge provided the utmost in dental care!  Solutions Dental entire staff strive to make everyone feel welcomed and part of their family. On top of that they support the non-profit Adorned in Grace which combats human trafficking. What a wonderful place to be a patient!
review.review_reply: Thank you for joining us in our mission, where dentistry is for a purpose! We love all our dental family!
Thank you for your review! We appreciate you!

review.comment: Always an exceptional experience.
review.review_reply: It is our pleasure to serve you with integrity, compassion and  excellence! We love having you as our dental family!
Thanks for joining our dental family!

review.comment: Very engaging and awesome staff. I usually don’t give reviews but these guys are awesome! Not only do they care for your teeth but they give back to the community and those in need of help.
review.review_reply: We are honored to serve you and your family with the utmost in dental care! Thanks for being apart of the Solutions Dental family! It is our mission to bring hope and healing to our community in an extraordinary way! Thanks for joining us!

review.comment: Solutions Dental is a fantastic dental office! I highly recommend it and I have referred my family and friends there. Dr. Gilge and the staff are very professional, kind and welcoming! I love Solutions Dental! Dr Gilge is an awesome dentist!
review.review_reply: Jessica, it is a pleasure to serve you! We are honored to have you be an integral part of our dental family! Thanks for sending your family and friends!
Thank you for allowing us the privilege to serve you!

review.comment: So caring and careful with patient discomfort! Beautiful dental work, in a very efficient, well run office.
review.review_reply: We are blessed to have you as our patient and to serve you with the utmost in dental care! Thanks for embracing the mission!

review.comment: Solutions Dentals hospitality is impeccable! They are friendly, engaging and walk you through the process at your pace and work with your schedule.
review.review_reply: Thank you for trusting us with your dental concerns. Welcome to our dental family!

review.comment: WONDERFUL experience!  Would highly recommend this dentist office.   Personal and professional!
review.review_reply: Thank you for allowing us to serve your dental concerns. It is a pleasure to have you be apart of our dental family!

review.comment: A simple filling this time, but as always quick, efficient, and willing to answer my questions.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for allowing us the honor to serve your dental concerns. It’s patients like yourself that make our day worthwhile! We appreciate you trusting us to provide the utmost in dental care and are excited that you joined our dental family where dentistry is for a purpose!

review.comment: The moment I entered the dental office I felt welcomed. There is a warm and peaceful spirit. Each member of the staff I had interaction with was caring and attentive. Dr. Gilge was gentle and patient as well as skilled. I could not recommend Solutions Dental more highly!
review.review_reply: It is with utmost confidence that we are here “for such a time as this” to provide you with our best for your dental and spiritual health! We are thrilled to be on mission together as family!

review.comment: I had a lot of significant work done by Dr. GILGE and his capable staff.  My experience could not have been better!  He offered solutions to some ongoing dental challenges I've had because of my very dry mouth.  His office staff was warm and welcoming and I was amazed at how quickly the work was completed.  I am grateful for his professional expertise and commitment to his patients.
review.review_reply: We are so thankful for your support of dentistry for a purpose!  It is our greatest joy to be able to serve you and your family! We are honored to provide you with the utmost in dental care.

review.comment: My appointment was for the six month cleaning of teeth that was due to have been done in March but did not occur due to Covid 19.  The appointment went well, but before I was ushered into the dental chair two younger people came from the dental portion of officd into the waiting area and did not wear masks.  The young man was in the waiting are for at least twenty minutes. This was of concern to me.
review.review_reply: Thank you for sharing your concern! We will look into this and make sure this does not happen again! We appreciate being able to serve you.
Thank you for allowing us to serve you! We are honored to be your choice for your dental care!

review.comment: I have never loved a dentist like I do the entire staff at Solutions Dental. They actually CARE holistically about every client. I LOVE THIS PLACE!
review.review_reply: Thank you for joining our family!  It is our greatest joy to serve you! We exist to brighten, whiten, and enlighten each of our patients smiles and their hearts!

review.comment: Superb work... friendly staff... comfortable surroundings... can’t recommend them more highly
review.review_reply: Thank you for being an integral part of our dental family on mission! We are eternally grateful to you and your family!

review.comment: Wonderful and friendly staff
review.review_reply: Thanks for being such a wonderful and friendly patient as well!  We are grateful that you are an integral part of our dental family! Thanks for joining us in the mission field!

review.comment: Dr. Gilge is a gift from God! I have had post- trauma due to past dental experiences. In the past, I needed sedation to get me through. Dr. Gilge walks me through everything and explains. He and the staff care for their patients as a whole person not just someone with teeth. Skillful, knowledgeable, kind, sincere and efficient. I am no longer afraid to see the dentist!
review.review_reply: It is our joy to serve you with compassionate care in each situation. Thank you for being part of our dental family. It patients like you that make our work so rewarding as we do aim to serve heart, mind, body and soul!
Thank you for your confidence in our office! We always aim to provide the best possible service!

review.comment: I had five fillings done quickly and with no pain, without Novocaine, as I had requested.  I don't like the numb feeling afterwards, when using it.  Avoiding it also makes everything go more quickly.  I don't think you will find a better dental practice.
review.review_reply: We appreciate you joining our dental family and making it the best!
Thank you for your review. We appreciate you!
Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you!
Thank you for your review and your confidence in our dental team.

review.comment: Best dentist ever.very welcoming staff are amazing,kind and very professional i would recommend my family and friends and everyone  to make a visit there you won't be disappointed.
review.review_reply: We are so honored and blessed to have you recommend your family and friends to join our dental family! We would love to “roll out the red carpet” and welcome them all! Thank you for your confidence in us!
Thank you for your review! We look forward to serving you with the utmost in dental care!
Thanks for your review!

review.comment: Honest and forth right about what needs to be done and not done. All the staff are very friendly and kind.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your wonderful comments. We think you are amazing as well! Thanks for showcasing our work every time you SMILE!

review.comment: Fast, Friendly and Painless.
review.review_reply: It is our aim to provide the utmost in dental care with compassion, integrity and excellence! Thanks for being such a wonderful patient!

review.comment: I brought in my 93 year old dad who is in a walker and has a very hard tine getting around. The whole  staff from the front desk to the hygienist to Dr. Gilge were so sweet, patient and accommodating. They even gave him stickers and a balloon, it made his day to be so loved on at a dentist appointment!
review.review_reply: It was a such a delight to meet and serve your dad! He has such a great sense of humor and made us all laugh! We are pleased to say he is the oldest & wisest member of our dental family!

review.comment: The staff at Solutions Dental combines technical excellence with a friendly atmosphere. They make going to the dentist fun.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review! We appreciate you and your family!

review.comment: Very friendly and respectful, highly recommend using for dental services!
review.review_reply: Thank you for trusting us to serve your dental concerns! We are happy to have you join our dental family!
Thank you for being apart of our family over the years! You brighten up our day!

review.comment: Theyre always so friendly and nice when I walk through the door. No matter who there greets me with a warm welcoming hugging sensation. They always make you feel wanted and loved. Its like im family there. I'm happy to be their patient. I Highly recommend them
review.review_reply: We are truly honored to have you as part of our dental family. Thank you for joining us in the mission field of life and making a significant impact to everyone you meet! It’s our pleasure to serve you!

review.comment: It’s hard finding a GOOD dentist, but finding a GREAT one is even harder. As a dental professional myself, I take the care of my teeth seriously to say the least. I spent countless hours searching google, asking colleagues and reading reviews in till I stumbled upon this practice and Im so glad I did. From the moment I heard the voice of Francine I felt immediately at ease. I had talked to so many people from other practices and felt brushed off or rushed. The people who work at this practice are honest kind and caring individuals, people who make me proud of being apart of dentistry. If your looking for a new dentist, or second opinion I would highly consider coming here.
review.review_reply: We are honored to be able to serve your dental concerns. It is our greatest joy to have you be apart of our dental family on mission to bring hope, joy & love to the community.

review.comment: Dr. Gilge and staff have been straightforward with their findings and recommendations.
review.review_reply: Welcome to our family. It is our pleasure to serve you and have you be integrally involved with the great commission! Thanks for joining us to change the world.

review.comment: Best dental care I’ve experienced! Wonderful people and a great environment! I highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words, we are so thankful that you are a part of our practice!

review.comment: As a physician, I know what it takes to run a professional, caring practice. That is what you find at Solutions Dental. Dr. Gilge is quite a competent dentist with a staff that cares about you from the moment you walk in until when you leave. I have found my dental home for life!
review.review_reply: We are honored to have you and your family on mission with us! Wherever two physicians unite miraculous healing is bound to happen! We thank you for catching the vision and making an eternal difference in all that we serve!

review.comment: There is not a better place to get work done than here. I have a severe dental phobia and I was falling asleep in the chair and the staff is so calm and that place is full of peace and love!!!!
review.review_reply: Welcome to our dental family! Thank you for allowing us the privilege to serve your dental concerns with the peace that surpasses all understanding! It is a joy to have you join our mission!

review.comment:
Love the people who work in this office and all the services they give back to the community.  I appreciate the reminder calls when I am due for an appointment. Getting dental work here is always a positive experience!
Solutions Dental also  donated  space out of their dental practice to facilitate involvement in raising awareness of human trafficking and providing community resources, activities, education,  and ministry.  I will miss them when I move out of state and hope the referrals I received are just as great as Solutions Dental!
review.review_reply: We have enjoyed having you as part of our dental family over the years! It has been such a joy to serve your dental needs and have you become a dear friend. We will miss you but who knows, our paths may cross again? Thank you for being apart of a mission impossible, which is only possible when God makes it possible ! Bon voyage!

review.comment:
I had a difficult molar extraction scheduled with Dr. Jeremiah Gilge, son of Dr. Kevin Gilge. The extraction was so expertly done that I felt utterly no discomfort, and in fact did not know the extraction was actually underway when it was already finished. I doubt anyone would ever say a tooth removal is a pleasant experience, but this one would be as close to that as possible.

This is a very good, possibly exceptional, practice. My wife and I drive 35 miles from Olympia for care here, when there are plenty of fine dentists much closer. We think it’s worth it. My experience on my visit this week confirms it. Highly recommended.
review.review_reply: We are honored to serve your family with the utmost in dentistry!! Thank you for trusting us to serve you over the decades! As we reflect on the path and fond memories of our friendship we truly are blessed to have you and wife be apart of our family at Solutions Dental, where dentistry is for a purpose!

review.comment: Not only are the Doctors and dental hygienist friendly the ladies who work up front, But Christine and Francine the ladies who work up front are the sweetest ladies in the whole, they not only know their customers by name but they have genuine connections with all of their patients
review.review_reply: We are so blessed to have you and your family join our dental family! It is patients like you that make our day more like a family reunion than a dental office! Thanks for joining us to bring hope and joy into the community!

review.comment: I have needed dental care for a long time--I am glad to have found Solutions Dental. They took the time to explain the plan to fix my teeth, professional and gracious.
review.review_reply: Thank you for allowing us the honor to serve your dental concerns. We are glad you are apart of our dental family!

review.comment: Great people and what a great experience. As soon as I walked in the front door very welcoming and a great atmosphere. Every one is such a blessing to be around, I would recommend  you should go there
review.review_reply: Thank you for being a part of our dental family! We are blessed by you and it is a honor you serve you dental needs! It is our greatest joy to have you be apart of the mission, “Dentistry for a purpose”!

review.comment: Thoroughly appreciated my appointment at Solutions Dental! All staff were professional and personable!
review.review_reply: We appreciate you and treasure you as an integral part of our dental family! Thank you for joining us in the mission; dentistry for a purpose!

review.comment: The entire staff at Solutions Dental is so kind! It has been a long time since I have been able to see a dentist and they got me in quickly and got a treatment plan going for me. I am so thankful to have found such an amazing business that takes such good care of their clients!
review.review_reply: We are absolutely thrilled that you trust us enough for us to serve your dental needs! It has been a blast getting to know you and having you join our dental family! We look forward to an amazing future together of health and happiness!

review.comment: Once again, Dr Gilbert and staff did a wonderful job! They run on schedule and are a completely clean and safe office. The cleaning by the hygienist was very gentle yet thorough. The atmosphere is welcoming and it is clear that they genuinely care about their patients and their community. Highly recommended!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for allowing us the privilege to serve you and your family with the best in dental care! We are eternally grateful that you have joined us in the mission where dentistry is for a purpose to bring hope and light into the dark world of modern slavery!

review.comment: Wonder staff, caring service, and great knowing that some of the office’s income goes to such a worthy cause. Highly recommended!
review.review_reply: Thank you for being a wonderful patient. It is a pleasure having you be apart of Dentistry for a cause that brings hope! Thanks for joining our family!

review.comment: I really love being in Solutions Dental each time. Everyone is so warm and welcome!!! They also work hard to meet each patient’s need...I strongly recommend this place for anyone who needs dental care!
review.review_reply: We are humbled that you travel over an hour each way to allow us the privilege to serve you over the years! It is our joy to have you as an integral part of our dental family on missions! We look forward to the journey ahead with you!
Thanks for your review! Glad you are an integral part of our family! There is no greater joy then to be united as a family to serve with compassion!
